channel.title: Launcher on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Launcher on purpleidea.com

item.title: gnome-do trick
item.description: I use gnome-do. It’s fairly useful. One quick trick: press SHIFT - <ENTER> instead of plain <ENTER> to launch without closing the launcher box. Therefore, if you want three terminals, type: <SUPER> - <SPACE>, t(erminal), (<SHIFT> - <ENTER> X 2), <ENTER>. You can hire James and his team at m9rx corporation. You can follow James on Mastodon for more frequent updates and other random thoughts. You can follow James on Twitter for more frequent updates and other random thoughts.
